title: How to Make an Alabama Slammer

steps.headline: Fill a highball, Collins, or otherwise taller glass with ice.
Pour the Southern Comfort, amaretto liqueur, and sloe gin in the glass.
(Optional) Pour the vodka into the glass.
Top up the rest of the glass with orange juice.
Mix well so everything blends.
steps.description: The drink should take on a redder color when mixed.

steps.headline: Garnish with an orange slice and/or maraschino cherries if desired.
Fill a snifter glass with ice.
Add ice to a cocktail shaker.
Add the Southern Comfort, amaretto liqueur, and slow sloe gin to the cocktail shaker.
Add the vodka (optional) and orange juice to the cocktail shaker.
Shake the ingredients vigorously for about five seconds.
Garnish with an orange slice and/or maraschino cherries if desired.
steps.description: An orange and cherry flag can be made using an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

text: Making In a Highball Glass Fill a highball, Collins, or otherwise taller glass with ice.  Pour the Southern Comfort, amaretto liqueur, and sloe gin in the glass.  (Optional) Pour the vodka into the glass.  Top up the rest of the glass with orange juice.  Mix well so everything blends. The drink should take on a redder color when mixed. Garnish with an orange slice and/or maraschino cherries if desired.  Making In a Sifter Glass Fill a snifter glass with ice.  Add ice to a cocktail shaker.  Add the Southern Comfort, amaretto liqueur, and slow sloe gin to the cocktail shaker.  Add the vodka (optional) and orange juice to the cocktail shaker.  Cap the shaker.  Shake the ingredients vigorously for about five seconds.  Strain into the snifter glass.  Garnish with an orange slice and/or maraschino cherries if desired. An orange and cherry flag can be made using an orange slice and a maraschino cherry. Serve the drink.
